name: Space Inversion Puzzle FREE
description:
Brand New Version totally FREE to play with no In-App purchase!

Puzzle Meets Arcade Invader style visuals in this stylish addictive game from our massively popular Space Inversion game series.
Can you stop the advancement of the alien invaders ?
Shoot detonators to create explosion combo chains. use your tractor beam pull in and move objects around to create chain reactions.
Play Space puzzle today !

Features:-
* Slick addictive Gameplay
* No In-App Purchases!
* Support for iCade
* Beautiful retro style graphics
* Out of this world Music tracks
* Left/Right handed touch button as well as accelerometer controls.

If you like Space Inversion Puzzle and would like to see it developed further and improved even more please rate 5*

For news on upcoming Apps and updates please follow us on Twitter:
http://twitter.com/#!/SilverlineArts
